raw_body: LORETTA CLARICE WEERASURIYA – expired. Loving wife of (late) Henry Oswald,​ loving daughter of (late) William Lawrence and Gertrude Fernando and daughter-in-law of (late) Harry and Girly Weerasuriya,​ loving mother and mother-in-law of Sharon,​ Hiran and Chamindira (Chammi),​ Lalanthi and Suresh and Priyantha,​ loving grandma of Pramudh and Nethmi,​ Thamith,​ Arnold and Anushika and Kineta,​ great grandmother of Baby Nethara. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect Home’ Jayaratne Funeral Parlour on the 6th and 7th Dec. respectively. Viewing times on the 6th from 3.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. and on 7th Dec. from 10.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. Thereafter Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery.080613
